title: World Championship Emblem
body: Hello, i have an upgraded Championship 2016 emblem and it just doesn't work for me to show it in game. CTRL+6 works only for champion mastery level but not for the emblem. Please help :[ {{champion:32}}

replies.body: The Worlds 2016 that you get with IP doesn't have an emote, only the Worlds team icons you buy with RP have the emote.

As *Lew* mentioned, only the 2016 team icons have emotes, the standard Championship 2016 icon does not. Check out our [Championship 2016 Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-) for complete details on this event.

Let me know if you have any questions.
